text:
In the documentation of ext_filter module there is a typo in a parameter for 
enscript. There is -W instead of -w. (I've spent a while to discover why it 
isn't working. I use debian sarge and enscript wants -w html, not -W html)

Thank you for a great work. Cheers VLP
creator: vlastimil.pavicek@centrum.cz
poirier@pobox.com
text:
Apparently there are different versions of enscript around.  The one on Debian wants -w html.  GNU enscript 1.6.1, and the enscript that ships on Mac OS X, want -W html.  

Since this is just an example, I think it's probably okay as it is.
